tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ComplianceData (
    compliance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id),
    standard_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_inspection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_compliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_id INT NOT NULL,
    standard_id INT NOT NULL,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (standard_id) REFERENCES standards(standard_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    compliance_id INT NOT NULL,
    update_date DATE NOT NULL,
    update_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (compliance_id) REFERENCES supplier_compliance(compliance_id)
);
